name: Pomegranate-Orange Relish With Walnuts
recipeIngredient: 2 seedless unpeeled oranges, preferably organic, cut into 1-inch chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 325 degrees. Spread walnuts on a baking pan in one layer and toast until fragrant, about 10 minutes.

In a food processor, pulse together the oranges, sugar and pepper and a generous pinch of salt until chunky. Add the walnuts and pulse a few times until the relish comes together. Transfer to a large bowl and stir in the pomegranate seeds and mint.
